# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/home/lunaixsky/Microbit/gesture-mouse/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_GESTURE-MOUSE_CPP_FILES
    "/home/lunaixsky/Microbit/gesture-mouse/source/main.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_GESTURE-MOUSE_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/lunaixsky/Microbit/gesture-mouse/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_executable (gesture-mouse
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_GESTURE-MOUSE_CPP_FILES}
)
set_target_properties(gesture-mouse PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE gesture-mouse)



target_link_libraries(gesture-mouse
    microbit
    mdl-gmouse
)
